name: Facebook Paisley with Pink
description:
Our iPad app, Friends with Benefits, will be coming soon!  Follow us on Facebook or Twitter If you are interested in up to date progress.  We'll tell you the second it's released and we'll be giving away free codes!

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Friends-with-Benefits/127473330654420?sk=wall
Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/@fwbapp

Part of the "iPad Series".  Paisley and Pink, exactly what the guys want :)
